_sText:
Counter-Strike: Source : Bot's Navigation Mesh for the map CS_UVALNO_VILLA_PRO


Nav Creator: Meurglis3, Release Date: April 30 2015

Here is the Navigation Mesh for excellent realistic country-styled map [cs_uvalno_villa_pro](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/158502) by Dinus Saurus (released August 2011).
It's a totally created from scratch and manually optimized (hand-tuned) .nav-file (because in original author's archive was included slightly edited and not fully playable auto-gen .nav-file).

Most of areas and paths were remade manually (about 80% of all area of map). Some missed important pathways were created from scratch (in particular - a way through a garage roof, path over the fence, etc.).

Well... bots have opportunity to use all walkable ways now. They will make hot bloody meat for your stil life pleasure! :D

Also this Navigation Mesh is fully Place Painted.

NOTE: For possibility of comparison and in-game testing the original .nav-file by map creator available to downloading with the [same map](http://css.gamebanana.com/maps/158502).

Fight and Fun! Your remarks and feedbacks are always welcomed :-)

Credits and Gratitudes:
   Dinus Saurus (for high detailed and very realistic cottage-themed map).

Additional Gratitudes:
   BarnDoor (for perfect playable navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),
   Chizbone (for informative and clever article BOT_BRAINED and a set of excellent navigation meshes),
   CoCoNUT (for fine hand-tuned navigation meshes for many fine CS:S maps),
   Valve Developer Community (for learning articles by Navigation Meshes and Navigation Mesh Commands).

It's a hotty-hotty-hotdog time! You motherfuckas think you're too good for these? :D
